header.title: CosNaming

erlref.modulesummary: The CosNaming service is a collection of interfaces that together define the naming service.

description.p: The naming service provides the principal mechanism for clients to find objects in an ORB based world. The naming service provides an initial naming context that functions as the root context for all names. Given this context clients can navigate in the name space.
